		[712] paragraph ''
			StaticText 'Closes'
			[713] link '#1209', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/issues/1209'
		[714] heading 'Summary'
		[716] paragraph ''
			StaticText "This PR adds the WCAG level to each checklist item so it's easier to know what checks to prioritize when trying to make a site accessible."
		[717] heading 'Notes / Questions'
		[719] list ''
			[720] listitem ''
				ListMarker '‚Ä¢'
				StaticText 'Do you think that the placement of the new information is correct / the best way to display it? I tried putting it in the part of the checklist item that is always visible but there there was a concern with responsiveness and the full'
				[721] code ''
					StaticText 'Level: AAA'
				StaticText 'was taking too much space.'
			[722] listitem ''
				ListMarker '‚Ä¢'
				[723] link '@ericwbailey', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/ericwbailey'
				StaticText 'you'
				[724] link 'mentioned', url='https://github.com/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/issues/1209#issuecomment-799887433'
				StaticText "in the issue that some checklist items might represent multiple success criterions. At least from what I saw each checklist item has only one WCAG link and each of those links only had one WCAG level asociated. That being said, I know for a fact that for example there are different contrast requirements for different levels but those don't seems to be covered in the checklist, just mention the one for level AA that is the minimum. Any thoughts on this? do you think that it's ok as I put it?"
			[725] listitem ''
				ListMarker '‚Ä¢'
				StaticText 'There was one checklist item that linked to a WCAG technique instead of a "Understanding WCAG" rule and didn\'t have a level asociated to for that one I put'
				[726] code ''
					StaticText "Level: doesn't apply"
				StaticText '. I thought about putting nothing at all but then it would have looked like it was missing.'
		[727] heading 'Preview'
		[729] link 'image', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/uploads/d31e2da5b1c6e583b51d90a55d8573ac/117575500-7ea2c680-b0b8-11eb-85d9-53b52254fc90.png'

				[971] button '', hasPopup='menu', expanded=False
				[976] button 'Reply to comment'

				[1000] paragraph ''
					StaticText 'Thank you so much for this pull request,'
					[1001] link '@aguscha333', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/aguscha333'
					StaticText '! I love the idea of clarifying the WCAG level(s) associated with each checklist item.'
				[1002] paragraph ''
					StaticText 'I did a major overhaul of the checklist data structure in #1268, and that blocks this PR for now. Once #1268 merges, I am happy to take responsibility for any merge conflicts that you experience here.'
				[1003] paragraph ''
					StaticText 'Some thoughts this PR itself:'
				[1004] list ''
					[1005] listitem ''
						ListMarker '‚Ä¢'
						StaticText 'I will leave'
						[1006] link '@ericwbailey', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/ericwbailey'
						StaticText 'to take point on the placement and presentation of this new information'
					[1007] listitem ''
						ListMarker '‚Ä¢'
						StaticText 'I think we could expand the data to associate more WCAG criteria with each checklist item, where appropriate. This could be a separate PR; the current work is a great start'
					[1008] listitem ''
						ListMarker '‚Ä¢'
						StaticText 'I think'
						[1009] code ''
							StaticText "Level: doesn't apply"
						StaticText "is fine for the cases where there's not a relevant success criterion"

			[1372] listitem ''
				[1378] link 'Administrator', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/root'
					[1379] image 'Administrator', url='https://www.gravatar.com/avatar/e64c7d89f26bd1972efa854d13d7dd61?s=80&d=identicon'
				[1383] button 'Show thread'
				[1385] link 'Administrator', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/root'
					StaticText 'Administrator'
				[1388] link '@root', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/root'
					StaticText '@root'
				StaticText 'started a thread on an outdated change in commit'
				[1393] link 'f0c57cc5', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/merge_requests/1270'
					StaticText 'f0c57cc5'
				[1396] link '3 years ago', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/merge_requests/1270#note_301244'
					[1397] time 'May 10, 2021 1:45am EDT'
						StaticText '3 years ago'
				StaticText 'Last updated by'
				[1401] link 'EJ Mason', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/mxmason'
				[1402] time 'May 10, 2021 11:33am EDT'
					StaticText '3 years ago'
			[1403] listitem ''
				[1406] link 'Administrator', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/root'
					[1407] image 'Administrator', url='https://www.gravatar.com/avatar/e64c7d89f26bd1972efa854d13d7dd61?s=80&d=identicon'
				[1411] link 'Administrator', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/root'
					StaticText 'Administrator'
				[1414] link '@root', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/root'
					StaticText '@root'
				StaticText '¬∑'
				[1420] link '3 years ago', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/merge_requests/1270#note_302679'
					[1421] time 'May 10, 2021 1:46pm EDT'
						StaticText '3 years ago'
				StaticText 'Contributor'
				[1429] button '', hasPopup='menu', expanded=False
				[1434] button 'Reply to comment'
				[1436] button 'Edit comment'
				[1439] button 'More actions'
				[1458] paragraph ''
					[1459] emphasis ''
						StaticText 'Created by: scottaohara'
				[1460] paragraph ''
					StaticText "While I realize this content predates the work being done here (which all the work in this PR seems pretty great from what I've reviewed) I was reviewing the actual checklist content as well. There are some SCs that need to be updated as they are not accurately referenced, and I figured it would be better to just lump that all into this PR, rather than create any merge conflicts or what not."
				[1461] paragraph ''
					StaticText "So, here's the issues that jumped out at me when reviewing:"
				[1462] blockquote ''
					[1463] paragraph ''
						StaticText 'Make sure that button, a, and label element content is unique and descriptive.'
				[1464] paragraph ''
					StaticText "this is likely more a 2.4.4 issue for links (possibly 2.4.9 depending on context) and a 2.4.6 issue for labels... possibly buttons. It's a bit dicey putting these all together, but the point being that 1.3.1 doesn't really apply here. I'm not sure exactly what you want to do here, but I suggest at the very least removing the SC if you can't cite multiple SCs."
				[1465] blockquote ''
					[1466] paragraph ''
						StaticText 'Use landmark elements to indicate important content regions.'
				[1467] paragraph ''
					StaticText 'This would be a 1.3.1 issue. 4.1.2 is more about interactive content'
				[1468] blockquote ''
					[1469] paragraph ''
						StaticText 'Avoid using the autofocus attribute.'
				[1470] paragraph ''
					StaticText 'Generally agree with this, but arguable if this would be a 2.4.3 issue. Sometimes using'
					[1471] code ''
						StaticText 'autofocus'
					StaticText "is exactly what you should do. Might be worth at least stating this is something to watch out for, rather than how this presently reads (to me) that it's an autofail."
				[1472] blockquote ''
					[1473] paragraph ''
						StaticText 'Remove title attribute tooltips.'
				[1474] paragraph ''
					StaticText "This is arguably more of a 2.1.1 keyboard issue as - if the content is actually important - would generally be inaccessible to keyboard only users. since title is generally exposed to AT, 4.1.2 doesn't really hold true here."
				[1475] blockquote ''
					[1476] paragraph ''
						StaticText 'Check to see that keyboard focus order matches the visual layout.'
				[1477] paragraph ''
					StaticText "1.3.2 may not apply here as content doesn't necessarily need to match visual focus order. 2.4.3 may be more appropriate to cite."
				[1478] blockquote ''
					[1479] paragraph ''
						StaticText 'headings'
				[1480] paragraph ''
					StaticText 'All checklist items in the headings section incorrectly cite 2.4.6. 2.4.6 is about the quality of heading text, but has nothing to do with whether the text is properly exposed as a heading. These would all be 1.3.1/best practice issues.'
				[1481] blockquote ''
					[1482] paragraph ''
						StaticText 'Use the th element for table headers (with appropriate scope attributes).'
				[1483] paragraph ''
					StaticText 'Unsure why this is cited as a 4.1.1 issue. Seems it should be a 1.3.1'
				[1484] blockquote ''
					[1485] paragraph ''
						StaticText 'Use the caption element to provide a title for the table.'
				[1486] paragraph ''
					StaticText 'Again, not a 2.4.6'
					[1487] emphasis ''
						StaticText 'unless'
					StaticText 'there is a'
					[1488] code ''
						StaticText '<caption>'
					StaticText 'already implemented which has crummy text.'
				[1489] blockquote ''
					[1490] paragraph ''
						StaticText 'All inputs in a form are associated with a corresponding label element.'
				[1491] paragraph ''
					StaticText 'Not a 3.2.2 issue. Typo for 3.3.2?'
				[1492] blockquote ''
					[1493] paragraph ''
						StaticText 'Associate input error messaging with the input it corresponds to.'
				[1494] paragraph ''
					StaticText 'Should be 1.3.1 and/or 4.1.2.'
				[1495] blockquote ''
					[1496] paragraph ''
						StaticText 'Ensure that media controls use appropriate markup.'
				[1497] paragraph ''
					StaticText "Probably should be 4.1.2 since that's about interactive controls"
				[1498] blockquote ''
					[1499] paragraph ''
						StaticText 'Confirm that transcripts are available.'
				[1500] paragraph ''
					StaticText 'Technically yes, audio content is 1.1.1. But alternatives to audio content would generally be cited under 1.2.3'
				[1501] blockquote ''
					[1502] paragraph ''
						StaticText 'Check your content in specialized browsing modes.'
				[1503] paragraph ''
					StaticText 'Would generally point to this as a strongly recommended best practice, not a wcag failure, particularly not this one.'
				[1504] blockquote ''
					[1505] paragraph ''
						StaticText 'Remove horizontal scrolling.'
				[1506] paragraph ''
					StaticText "would qualify some content - e.g., tables, maps, large graphs - are totally fine to have bi-directional scrolling. dont' want to make people think they have to negate table semantics and then potentially wind up with other wcag failures (e.g., 1.3.2) when content no longer makes sense in the reading order."
			[1509] listitem ''
				[1512] link 'EJ Mason', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/mxmason'
					[1513] image 'EJ Mason', url='https://www.gravatar.com/avatar/2b916a82cf76b84365e49af6bded0e02?s=80&d=identicon'
				[1517] link 'EJ Mason', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/mxmason'

					StaticText '@mxmason'
				StaticText '¬∑'
				[1526] link '3 years ago', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/merge_requests/1270#note_302675'

						StaticText '3 years ago'
				StaticText 'Contributor'
				[1535] button '', hasPopup='menu', expanded=False
				[1540] button 'Reply to comment'
				[1542] button 'Edit comment'
				[1545] button 'More actions'
				[1564] paragraph ''
					StaticText 'Thanks for these notes, @scottaohara!'
				[1565] paragraph ''
					[1566] link '@aguscha333', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/aguscha333'
					StaticText ", I'd be happy to implement the content changes Scott has pointed out, if you'd like. I think these changes could either go into this PR, or into a separate one dedicated to the rewrite."
			[1569] listitem ''
				[1572] link 'Agustina Chaer', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/aguscha333'
					[1573] image 'Agustina Chaer', url='https://www.gravatar.com/avatar/c3f4b8256d6ee40eda4c82780f87dc89?s=80&d=identicon'

				StaticText '¬∑'
				[1586] link '3 years ago', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/merge_requests/1270#note_302678'
					[1587] time 'May 10, 2021 6:54pm EDT'
						StaticText '3 years ago'
				StaticText 'Author'
				[1595] button '', hasPopup='menu', expanded=False
				[1600] button 'Reply to comment'
				[1602] button 'Edit comment'
				[1605] button 'More actions'
				[1624] paragraph ''
					[1625] link '@mxmason', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/mxmason'
					StaticText "thanks for offering. If you don't mind I'd like to try to implement the changes myself to keep contributing to the repo. Those changes do touch more technical subjects about WCAG itself so what I will need is help with a thorrow review since I only recently started learning about accessibility so I could have some conceptual errors in the changes. I do think that it's better to do it in a separate PR since the new changes have nothing to do with the initial purpose of this PR. I can create a branch off of this one to get minimal conflicts."

				[1801] paragraph ''

			[1805] listitem ''
				[1808] link 'Agustina Chaer', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/aguscha333'
					[1809] image 'Agustina Chaer', url='https://www.gravatar.com/avatar/c3f4b8256d6ee40eda4c82780f87dc89?s=80&d=identicon'
				[1813] link 'Agustina Chaer', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/aguscha333'

				[1822] link '3 years ago', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/merge_requests/1270#note_302681'
					[1823] time 'May 15, 2021 8:21am EDT'

				[1831] button '', hasPopup='menu', expanded=False
				[1836] button 'Reply to comment'
				[1838] button 'Edit comment'

				[1860] paragraph ''
					[1861] link '@ericwbailey', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/ericwbailey'
					StaticText ''
					[1862] link '@mxmason', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/mxmason'
					StaticText 'Tried implementing'
					[1863] link '#1277', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/issues/1277'
					StaticText "but going through the suggestions there are a lot that are more open ended and would require some more decision making from someone with more knowledge on the topic. I'm glad to keep contributing in the future but I think I need to sit this one out since I am still a newbie with a11y."
			[1866] listitem ''
				[1869] link 'Administrator', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/root'
					[1870] image 'Administrator', url='https://www.gravatar.com/avatar/e64c7d89f26bd1972efa854d13d7dd61?s=80&d=identicon'
				[1874] link 'Administrator', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/root'

				[1877] link '@root', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/root'

				StaticText '¬∑'
				[1883] link '3 years ago', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/a11yproject/a11yproject.com/-/merge_requests/1270#note_302687'
					[1884] time 'May 15, 2021 10:27am EDT'
						StaticText '3 years ago'
				StaticText 'Contributor'
				[1892] button '', hasPopup='menu', expanded=False
				[1897] button 'Reply to comment'
				[1899] button 'Edit comment'
				[1902] button 'More actions'
				[1921] paragraph ''
					[1922] emphasis ''
						StaticText 'Created by: scottaohara'
				[1923] paragraph ''
					StaticText 'if you think more work needs to go into correctly citing the WCAG SCs, then I would suggest you simply comment out the SCs for the checklist items where there is not a simple swap out of the errant SC for the correct one.'
				[1924] paragraph ''
					StaticText 'Then additional thought can go into the items that need more nuance, without continuing to cite inaccurate SCs while that work is being done.'
			[1927] listitem ''
				[1930] link 'Agustina Chaer', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/aguscha333'
					[1931] image 'Agustina Chaer', url='https://www.gravatar.com/avatar/c3f4b8256d6ee40eda4c82780f87dc89?s=80&d=identicon'
